body_html:
Wait, so that means that we can't write new autograd.Function using Cpp extensions?
Also, prior to this PR, was the backward graph broken if we used Cpp extensions in an autograd.Function?
body_text:
Wait, so that means that we can't write new autograd.Function using Cpp extensions?
Also, prior to this PR, was the backward graph broken if we used Cpp extensions in an autograd.Function?
body:
Wait, so that means that we can't write new `autograd.Function` using Cpp extensions?
Also, prior to this PR, was the backward graph broken if we used Cpp extensions in an `autograd.Function`?
